channel.title: +1 Forward - Improv for Gamers, 2nd edition
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/improv-for-gamers-2nd-edition
Karen Twelves joins Rach and Rich to talk about her book currently on Gamefound - *Improv for Gamers, 2nd edition* !
**Timecodes:** 0:01:51 - Read a Sitch about Relationships in PbtA 0:09:14 - Open Your Brain to Improv for Gamers 0:22:58 - Act Under Fire with some Improv games!
**Gamefound Info** : Gamefound preview page: https://tinyurl.com/IfG2ndEd (give it a follow for some freebies!) When it goes live on April 5, the campaign link will be https://gamefound.com/projects/evil-hat/improv-for-gamers
